Item.message: Please perform an Enterprise Change Assessment of the CR
Item.name: Enterprise Change Assessment

Item.message: Review ECA and Route the CR
Item.name: Route CR

Item.description: Modify the ECR and resubmit or cancel the ECR
Ensure the CR is ready for initial review

Item.message: An CR has been submitted, please review it
Item.name: CL Review

Item.description: Review Affected Items, add additional if necessary
Make sure the Assigned Creator is correct

Item.message: Schedule and hold a CRB meeting
Item.name: CRB Meeting
